summary: A collection of utilities for preparing natural‑language datasets for sequence‑classification models. It defines an abstract DataProcessor that parses raw tabular files, extracts label sets and creates training/validation examples, and includes numerous helper functions for reading/writing data, normalizing text, building vocabularies, computing class and frequency weights, and other common preprocessing steps.
business_intent: Enable downstream NLP applications to quickly transform raw text corpora into model‑ready inputs, ensuring consistent tokenization, label handling, and balanced class distributions for training and evaluation.
